ygData.subject: Re: [EQCheats] ShowEQ?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... hmmmm... then why do you subscribe to a CHEAT group? Must not have a Linux machine... or you d be using it too eh? Didn t have to fear that from myu
ygData.messageBody:
--- Michelle <moonbeam@...> wrote:
> I have a particular hatred of Show EQ, people use it
> on the Team PVP servers
> to pick their victims - what use is anonymous when
> some twink with Show EQ
> can tell exactly what level you are, how many
> hitpoints you have and how
> much cash you are carrying? To me this program is
> the lowest of the low and
> I cheer when I hear of someone getting banned for
> using it.
>
> Nemene Nocturne
> Tallon Zek
>
hmmmm... then why do you subscribe to a CHEAT group?
Must not have a Linux machine... or you'd be using it
too eh?
Didn't have to fear that from myu friend. He only
played the regular old servers. No pvp. Oh... and if
you use Linux... there is no way they can tell if you
are using it... because that would require them to
look at your network... which is illegal. The only
people that have been caught were using the Windows
version (which is no more), or were stupid enough to
say something about it in game. So... don't expect too
many bans from it... but it does happen from time to
time... like with nmy friend who was cancelling his
account anyway and announced to the whole server that
he was using it. Hehehe. was funny actually.
-Kenny
